turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I order a coffee from starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course you can. What store would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The closest one to my work.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, lets go with the Yopp Rd Starbucks, it's 3 minutes from your office.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome, I know which one that is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I'll go with a flat white today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great choice, what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmm, it's been a rough morning, lets go with a large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like a grande which is 16 oz or a venti which is 20 oz?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, and what type of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Jeez, so many options. What kind of milk do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have Almond, Coconut, Nonfat, Whole, 2%, and Soy

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let go with 2%

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, was there anything else you would like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I think that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll place your order now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been placed and will be ready for pickup at the Yopp rd Starbucks shortly. I have also sent the receipt via text to your mobile device.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome, thanks again!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. Enjoy!
